snippet: Hiroki Kuroda allowed three runs over seven innings and the Yankees offense struggled to put hits together in a loss to the White Sox.
abstract: Chicago White Sox beat New York Yankees, 3-2.
lead_paragraph: Hiroki Kuroda allowed three runs over seven innings and the Yankees offense struggled to put hits together in a loss to the White Sox.

headline.main: Yankees’ Bats Contribute to the Quiet on Day 2 of Rodriguez’s Return
headline.print_headline: Yankees’ Bats Contribute to the Quiet on Day 2 of Rodriguez’s Return
